name: Midas XRP
description: Midas XRP (mXRP) is a token on the XRPL EVM that represents XRP bridged securely through the Axelar network. It allows XRP holders to use their assets in EVM-based applications without losing exposure to the original token. The project functions as a vault, ensuring users can deposit XRP, receive mXRP, and interact with decentralized finance protocols while maintaining liquidity in a tokenized format.
